about_the_game:
Maliguard is an upcoming swashbuckling stealth misadventure, in which an ambitious alchemist must reclaim his inheritance from a web of intrigue.

Plan, experiment and improvise with a variety of options for every encounter.

  • Swashbuckling: Battle foes with sword and pistol in fast paced, challenging combat. Kick enemies into hazards, or pick up almost anything to throw at your opponents. Life and death is in your hands with lethal and non-lethal options.
  • Stealth: Sneak, avoid and distract enemies with almost anything you can find. Or blend in via social stealth, using your wits to try and talk your way out of conflict.
  • Misadventure: Open ended objective design leaves the player free to try a variety of solutions, though reactive Characters will try their best to foil your plans.
  • Alchemy: Turn mundane ingredients into potent concoctions with a variety of effects. From blinding blasts to slippery surfaces and more.
  • Exploration: Explore the world to uncover secrets and side stories. Gather information to aid in convincing others and dispelling mysteries.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. It contains General Mature Content, including violence, drug and alcohol use, strong language and sexual references.
